sentences.en: He is inconsistent in his views.

sentences.cn: 她的论点本质上是相互矛盾的.

sentences.en: His acount of what happended was inconsistent.
sentences.cn: 他对前后所发生的事情的叙述是矛盾的.

sentences.en: His dissolute life is inconsistent with his Puritan upbringing.
sentences.cn: 他的放荡生活和他的清教徒教养相悖.

sentences.en: Jack's inconsistent argument derange us all.
sentences.cn: 杰克前后矛盾的争辩困扰了我们大家.

sentences.en: Many modeless dialogs are implemented awkwardly. Their behavior is inconsistent and confusing.
sentences.cn: 大多数非模态对话框实现得很笨拙, 它们的行为很不一致,令人十分困惑.

sentences.en: Moon, as great as he is, has had some inconsistent days.
sentences.cn: 伟大如穆恩者，也有状态起伏的时候。

sentences.en: The accounts of the witnesses are inconsistent.
sentences.cn: 几位目击者的说法不一致。

sentences.en: The evidence given in court was inconsistent with what he had previously told them.
sentences.cn: 法庭上的证词与他当初告诉他们的不一致。

sentences.en: The outburst was inconsistent with the image he has cultivated.
sentences.cn: 这样大发脾气与他所树立的个人形象不相称。

sentences.en: The report is inconsistent with the financial statements.
sentences.cn: 这个报告与财务报表内容不一致。
他们的足球踢得时好时坏.

sentences.en: This legislation is inconsistent with what they call Free Trade.
sentences.cn: 这项立法与他们所谓的自由贸易相抵触。

sentences.en: We had a terrific start to the season, but recently we've been inconsistent.
sentences.cn: 赛季之初我们有非常好的开局，但最近却时好时坏。
你这人反复无常，真叫人难以捉摸。

phrases.tran_cn: adj. 与…不一致；与……相矛盾

trans.tran_cn: 不一致的，不调和的，前后矛盾的，不合逻辑的，反复无常的，歧出
trans.tran_en: two statements that are inconsistent cannot both be true
